lead_paragraph: Matt Cullen scored three goals for the first hat trick of his 11-year N.H.L. career, helping the Carolina Hurricanes to a 6-2 victory over the visiting Colorado Avalanche.
snippet: Matt Cullen scored three goals for the first hat trick of his 11-year N.H.L. career, helping the Carolina Hurricanes to a 6-2 victory over the visiting Colorado Avalanche.
